function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to close interaction during communication between municipality and electric utility company","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation, potential outbreak among stakeholders","Mitigation":"Implement remote communication methods, reduce in-person meetings, and promote virtual collaboration","Technologies":"Video conferencing, communication software, and collaboration tools","People":"Stakeholders involved in the communication process","Owner":"Municipality and electric utility company"},{"Description":"Lack of structured information leading to inefficiency in data analysis and management","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis, delays in project implementation, and misinformed decision-making","Mitigation":"Implement data structuring and management systems, conduct data cleaning and normalization, and provide training on data organization","Technologies":"Data management software, data cleaning tools, and data normalization algorithms","People":"Data analysts, project managers, and decision-makers","Owner":"Project management team"},{"Description":"Risk of cross-contamination and disease transmission through close contact with public infrastructure such as public lighting and traffic lights","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission to maintenance workers and individuals interacting with public infrastructure","Mitigation":"Implement regular cleaning and disinfection protocols for public infrastructure, provide personal protective equipment for maintenance workers, and promote public awareness on safe interaction with infrastructure","Technologies":"Cleaning and disinfection equipment, personal protective gear, and public education campaigns","People":"Maintenance workers, pedestrians, and users of public infrastructure","Owner":"Municipal administration"}]}
